类 Help

  • java.lang.Object
    • Help

  • public class Help
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a help class for accomplishing some auxiliary functions
    从以下版本开始:
    24/09/2021

    • 字段概要

      限定符和类型 字段和说明

      A variable created to record the max width for text

        public static int max
        A variable created to record the max width for text

    • 方法详细资料

      • checkValid

        public static java.lang.Boolean checkValid(java.lang.String[] args)
        Attempts to check the validity of input.
        参数:
        args: - User input array
        返回:
        Check whether the input is valid or not.If it's valid, returns true. Otherwise, returns false.

      • isInt

        public static java.lang.Boolean isInt(java.lang.String str)
        Attempts to check the validity of input align width.
        参数:
        str: - User input width
        返回:
        Check whether the input is a positive integer or not.If it's, returns true. Otherwise, returns false.

      • fillBlanks

        public static void fillBlanks(int number)
        Attempts to print spaces.
        参数:
        number: - Number of spaces that need to print

      • printSignLine

        public static void printSignLine(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> line,
                                 int max,
                                 int length,
                                 java.lang.Boolean flag)
        Attempts to print lines in required width for signpost align and upper part of signpost.
        参数:
        line: - Lines formed with required number of words and spaces
        max: - The max width for the text part
        length: - Required width by user input
        flag: - aims to check whether it's the first line(if true, print the upper part)

      • printHandholding

        public static void printHandholding()
        Attempts to print lower part of signpost.
